scroll.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a long piece of paper that can be rolled up, and is used as an official document
scroll.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a design shaped like a piece of rolled up paper
scroll.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to move information on a computer screen up or down so that you can read it
scroll.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Could you scroll down a few lines?
scroll.translation[2].definitions[0].def: to move information on a computer screen up or down so that you can read it
scroll.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: You can scroll up to the top of the document using this bar.
